column4: why did he say no? this is not a channel to discuss hacking or illegal activities
to get a wired connection to the router, you have to ask your landlord
so i've got to wire it from his place to mine? thats lame, i know there's a better way
if his wireless router is providing you the internet and you want a WIRED connection, you must use cat5 or cat6e cabling and wire it from your own router/hub/switch to his wireless router
